companyInfo.Competitors: Beacon Hill Staffing Group, PageGroup, Solomon Page

jobDescription: This leading media provider is dedicated to providing their customers with a variety of high-quality entertainment products and services. The company’s work environment is employee centered, as they value and celebrate individual successes and diversity amongst their staff.  Specific Responsibilities Include:  Work closely with BI architect and development team  Understand end-to-end data flow for all BI subject areas  Research data anomalies in complex business systems  Develop audit reports  Provide reports and recommendations for correction of data  Develop business and technical processes  Provide data and quality assurance  Provide Tier2 support
